trans-unit.source: Sqlite will save the db with this filename.
trans-unit.target: Sqlite 将使用此文件名保存数据库.

trans-unit.source: Unencrypted, temporary password. App will encrypt it and delete this.
trans-unit.target: 未加密的临时密码.应用程序将加密并删除此密码.

trans-unit.source: All file-based data will be stored here (sqlite database, job history data).
trans-unit.target: 所有基于文件的数据都将存储在这里（sqlite数据库、失败任务历史数据）.

trans-unit.source: Creates these users in the DB during startup if they do not exist. If a user with this name exist, it won't be overwritten, even if the role is different.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些用户不存在,则在启动时在数据库中创建它们.如果存在同名用户,则即使角色不同,也不会覆盖该用户.

trans-unit.source: Setting a non empty search query here will make the app to only SHOW photos and videos that match the query. You can override this at every user separately.
trans-unit.target: Setting a non empty search query here will make the app to only SHOW photos and videos that match the query. You can override this at every user separately.

trans-unit.source: Setting a non empty search query here will make the app to HIDE photos and videos that match the query. You can override this at every user separately.
trans-unit.target: Setting a non empty search query here will make the app to HIDE photos and videos that match the query. You can override this at every user separately.

trans-unit.source: if true, 'lanczos3' will used to scale photos, otherwise faster but lower quality 'nearest'.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则使用“lanczos3”缩放照片,否则使用速度更快但质量更低的“nearest”.
转换后的照片和缩略图质量

trans-unit.source: Use high quality chroma subsampling in webp. See: https://sharp.pixelplumbing.com/api-output#webp.
trans-unit.target: 在 webp 中使用高质量色度二次采样. 参阅: https://sharp.pixelplumbing.com/api-output#webp.

trans-unit.source: Add any sharp options here. They will be added to sharp constructor as raw params. See: https://sharp.pixelplumbing.com/api-constructor/.
trans-unit.target: Add any sharp options here. They will be added to sharp constructor as raw params. See: https://sharp.pixelplumbing.com/api-constructor/.

trans-unit.source: This ratio of the face bounding box will be added to the face as a margin. Higher number add more margin.
trans-unit.target: 此比例的面部边界框将作为边距添加到面部.数字越大,边距越大.

trans-unit.source: Filters out entry that are closer than this to each other in meters.
trans-unit.target: 过滤掉以米为单位且比这更近的条目.

trans-unit.source: Filters out entry that would fall on the line if we would just connect the previous and the next points. This setting sets the sensitivity for that (higher number, more points are filtered).
trans-unit.target: 如果我们只连接前一个点和下一个点,则会过滤掉落在线上的条目.此设置用于设置敏感度（数字越大,过滤的点越多）..

trans-unit.source: Filters out entry that are closer than this in time in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 过滤掉比此时间更近的条目（以毫秒为单位）.

trans-unit.source: After creating a sharing link, it can be updated for this long.
trans-unit.target: 创建共享链接后,可以更新该时间长度.

trans-unit.source: If there was no indexing in this time, it reindexes. (skipped if indexes are in DB and sensitivity is low).
trans-unit.target: 如果此时没有索引,则重新索引.（如果索引在数据库中并且敏感度较低,则跳过）.
文件夹重新索引灵敏度

trans-unit.source: Set the reindexing sensitivity. High value check the folders for change more often. Setting to never only indexes if never indexed or explicit running the Indexing Job.
trans-unit.target: 设置重新索引的敏感度.高值表示更频繁地检查文件夹是否有更改.设置为“从不”时,仅在从未索引过或明确运行索引失败任务时才进行索引.

trans-unit.source: Folders to exclude from indexing. If an entry starts with '/' it is treated as an absolute path. If it doesn't start with '/' but contains a '/', the path is relative to the image directory. If it doesn't contain a '/', any folder with this name will be excluded.
trans-unit.target: 要从索引中排除的文件夹.如果条目以“/”开头,则将其视为绝对路径.如果它不以“/”开头但包含“/”,则该路径是相对于图片目录的路径.如果它不包含“/”,则任何具有此名称的文件夹都将被排除.

trans-unit.source: Files that mark a folder to be excluded from indexing. Any folder that contains a file with this name will be excluded from indexing.
trans-unit.target: 标记文件夹不被索引的文件.任何包含此名称文件的文件夹都将被排除在索引之外.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of duplicates to list.
trans-unit.target: 列出的重复项的最大数量.
SQL 查询的日志记录级别.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the app adds "Server-Timing" http header to the response.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, the app adds "Server-Timing" http header to the response.
失败任务历史记录大小.

trans-unit.source: Jobs load this many photos or videos from the DB for processing at once.
trans-unit.target: Jobs load this many photos or videos from the DB for processing at once.

trans-unit.source: Target bit rate of the output video will be scaled down to this. This should be less than the upload rate of your home server.
trans-unit.target: Target bit rate of the output video will be scaled down to this. This should be less than the upload rate of your home server.

trans-unit.source: The height of the output video will be scaled down to this, while keeping the aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 输出视频的高度将缩小, 同时保持纵横比.

trans-unit.source: Target frame per second (fps) of the output video will be scaled down to this.
trans-unit.target: Target frame per second (fps) of the output video will be scaled down to this.

trans-unit.source: The range of the Constant Rate Factor (CRF) scale is 0–51, where 0 is lossless, 23 is the default, and 51 is worst quality possible.
trans-unit.target: 恒定速率因子 (CRF) 标度的范围是 0–51,其中 0 是无损, 23 是默认值, 51 是最差.

trans-unit.source: A preset is a collection of options that will provide a certain encoding speed to compression ratio. A slower preset will provide better compression (compression is quality per filesize).
trans-unit.target: 预设是一组选项, 可提供特定的编码速度与压缩比. 越慢的预设可以提供更高的压缩比(会影响画质).

trans-unit.source: It will be sent to ffmpeg as it is, as custom output options.
trans-unit.target: 它将作为自定义输出选项按原样发送到 ffmpeg.

trans-unit.source: It will be sent to ffmpeg as it is, as custom input options.
trans-unit.target: 它将作为自定义输入选项按原样发送到 ffmpeg.

trans-unit.source: To ensure smooth video playback, video transcoding is recommended to a lower bit rate than the server's upload rate. The transcoded videos will be saved to the thumbnail folder. You can trigger the transcoding manually, but you can also create an automatic encoding job in advanced settings mode.
trans-unit.target: To ensure smooth video playback, video transcoding is recommended to a lower bit rate than the server's upload rate. The transcoded videos will be saved to the thumbnail folder. You can trigger the transcoding manually, but you can also create an automatic encoding job in advanced settings mode.

trans-unit.source: Filters the sub-folders with this search query. If filter results no photo, the app will search again without the filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用此搜索查询过滤子文件夹.如果过滤结果中没有照片,应用将再次搜索,无需过滤器.

trans-unit.source: If multiple cover is available sorts them by these methods and selects the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个封面可用,则按这些方法对它们进行排序并选择第一个.

trans-unit.source: Images are loaded from this folder (read permission required)
trans-unit.target: 图像从此文件夹加载(需要读取权限)

trans-unit.source: Thumbnails, converted photos, videos will be stored here (write permission required)
trans-unit.target: 缩略图、转换后的照片、视频将存储在这里(需要写入权限)

trans-unit.source: Video support uses ffmpeg. ffmpeg and ffprobe binaries need to be available in the PATH or the @ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg and @ffprobe-installer/ffprobe optional node packages need to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 使用ffmpeg来提供视频支持.ffmpeg 和 ffprobe 二进制文件需要在 PATH 中可用,或者需要安装 @ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg 和 @ffprobe-installer/ffprobe 可选包.

trans-unit.source: Users kept logged in for this long time.
trans-unit.target: 用户保持登录状态的时间.

trans-unit.source: Should the backend trust proxies to extract remote Client IP. See express docs, for valid values: https://expressjs.com/en/guide/behind-proxies.html
trans-unit.target: Should the backend trust proxies to extract remote Client IP. See express docs, for valid values: https://expressjs.com/en/guide/behind-proxies.html

trans-unit.source: Port number. Port 80 is usually what you need.
trans-unit.target: 端口号.通常您需要的是80端口.

trans-unit.source: Server will accept connections from this IPv6 or IPv4 address.
trans-unit.target: 服务器将接受来自此 IPv6 或 IPv4 地址的连接.

trans-unit.source: If you add a new folder to your gallery, the site indexes it automatically. If you would like to trigger indexing manually, click index button. (Note: search only works among the indexed directories.)
trans-unit.target: 如果您向图库添加新文件夹,网站会自动为其编制索引.如果您想手动触发索引,请点击索引按钮.（注意：搜索功能仅在已编制索引的目录中有效.）

trans-unit.source: Specify a search query and sorting that the app can use to pick the best photo for an album and folder cover. There is no way to manually pick folder and album cover in the app. You can tag some of your photos with 'cover' and set that as search query or rate them to 5 and set sorting to descending by rating.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索查询和排序方式,以便应用选择最佳照片作为相册和文件夹封面.应用无法手动选择文件夹和相册封面.您可以将部分照片标记为“封面”,并将其设置为搜索查询,或者将其评分为 5 分,并将排序设置为按评分降序排列.

trans-unit.source: The App can send messages (like photos on the same day a year ago. aka: "Top Pick"). Here you can configure the delivery method.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序可以发送消息（例如一年前同一天的照片,又称“精选”）.您可以在这里配置发送方式.

trans-unit.source: Is the connection secure. See https://nodemailer.com/smtp/#tls-options for more details
trans-unit.target: 连接是否安全. 查看 https://nodemailer.com/smtp/#tls-options 获取详细信息

trans-unit.source: if this is true and secure is false then Nodemailer (used library in the background) tries to use STARTTLS. See https://nodemailer.com/smtp/#tls-options for more details
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为是,且安全为否,则 Nodemailer（后台使用的库）会尝试使用机会性加密. 查看 https://nodemailer.com/smtp/#tls-options 获取详细信息

trans-unit.source: User to connect to the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: 连接到 SMTP 服务器的用户.

trans-unit.source: Password to connect to the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: 连接 SMTP 服务器的密码.

trans-unit.source: Some services do not allow sending from random e-mail addresses. Set this accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 有些服务不允许从随机电子邮件地址发送邮件.请据此进行设置.

trans-unit.source: The app uses Nodemailer in the background for sending e-mails. Refer to https://nodemailer.com/usage/ if some options are not clear.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序在后台使用 Nodemailer 发送电子邮件. 如果某些选项不清楚,请参考 https://nodemailer.com/usage/.

trans-unit.source: Repository url that points to a list of extensions in .md format.
trans-unit.target: Repository url that points to a list of extensions in .md format.

trans-unit.source: Folder where the app stores all extensions. Individual extensions live in their own sub-folders.
trans-unit.target: Folder where the app stores all extensions. Individual extensions live in their own sub-folders.

trans-unit.source: Automatically removes all tables from the DB that are not used anymore.
trans-unit.target: Automatically removes all tables from the DB that are not used anymore.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown at once. If there is not enough items to reach this value, it takes up to double of the individual items.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number autocomplete items shown at once. If there is not enough items to reach this value, it takes up to double of the individual items.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per photo category.
trans-unit.target: 每个照片类别显示的最大自动完成项目数.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per directory category.
trans-unit.target: 每个目录类别显示的最大自动完成项目数.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per caption category.
trans-unit.target: 每个标题类别显示的最大自动完成项目数.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per position category.
trans-unit.target: 每个位置类别显示的自动完成项目的最大数量.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per faces category.
trans-unit.target: 每个面孔类别显示的最大自动完成项目数.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per keyword category.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键词条目显示的最大自动完成项目数.

trans-unit.source: Show hints while typing search query.
trans-unit.target: 在键入搜索查询时显示提示.
每个类别的最大条目数

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per category.
trans-unit.target: 每个类别显示的最大自动完成条目数.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of photos and videos that are listed in one search result.
trans-unit.target: 一个搜索结果中列出的照片和视频的最大数量.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of directories that are listed in one search result.
trans-unit.target: 一个搜索结果中列出的目录的最大数量.

trans-unit.source: Search returns also with directories, not just media.
trans-unit.target: 搜索结果不仅返回媒体,还返回目录.

trans-unit.source: Search also returns with metafiles from directories that contain a media file of the matched search result.
trans-unit.target: 搜索还会从包含匹配搜索结果的媒体文件的目录中返回元文件.

trans-unit.source: Required minimum right to show the albums tab.
trans-unit.target: Required minimum right to show the albums tab.

trans-unit.source: Sets if the layer is dark (used as default in the dark mode).
trans-unit.target: 设置图层是否为暗色（在暗色模式下用作默认）.
SVG 路径查看框. 参阅: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Attribute/viewBox

trans-unit.source: Content elements (paths, circles, rects) of the SVG icon. Icons used on the map: fontawesome.com/icons.
trans-unit.target: SVG 图标的内容元素（路径、圆圈、矩形）. 图标地图: fontawesome.com/icons.

trans-unit.source: Color of the path. Use any valid css colors.
trans-unit.target: 路径颜色.使用任何有效的 CSS 颜色.

trans-unit.source: Dash pattern of the path. Represents the spacing and length of the dash. Read more about dash array at: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Attribute/stroke-dasharray.
trans-unit.target: 路径的虚线图案.表示虚线的间距和长度.了解更多关于虚线数组的信息,请访问: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Attribute/stroke-dasharray.

trans-unit.source: Set the icon of the map marker pin.
trans-unit.target: 设置地图标记图钉的图标.

trans-unit.source: List of regex string to match the name of the path. Case insensitive. Empty list matches everything.
trans-unit.target: 用于匹配路径名称的正则表达式字符串列表.不区分大小写.空列表则匹配所有内容.

trans-unit.source: List of regex string to match the name of the path.
trans-unit.target: 与路径名称匹配的正则表达式字符串列表.

trans-unit.source: Name of the marker and path group on the map.
trans-unit.target: 地图上的标记和路径组的名称.

trans-unit.source: Matchers for a given map and path theme.
trans-unit.target: 给定地图和路径主题的匹配器.

trans-unit.source: Map will use thumbnail images as markers instead of the default pin.
trans-unit.target: 地图将使用缩略图作为标记而不是默认的图钉.

trans-unit.source: MapBox needs an access token to work, create one at https://www.mapbox.com.
trans-unit.target: MapBox 需要访问令牌才能工作,请创建一个 https://www.mapbox.com.

trans-unit.source: The map module will use these urls to fetch the map tiles.
trans-unit.target: 地图模块将使用这些链接来获取地图图块.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of markers to be shown on the map preview on the gallery page.
trans-unit.target: 图库页面地图预览中显示的最大标记数.

trans-unit.source: Markers are grouped and themed by these settings
trans-unit.target: 标记按这些设置分组和主题的项

trans-unit.source: Map will bend the path if two points are this far apart on latititude axes. This intended to bend flight if only the end and the start points are given.
trans-unit.target: 如果纬度轴上的两个点相距如此远,地图路径就会弯曲.这旨在在仅指定终点和起点的情况下弯曲路径.

trans-unit.source: Default sorting method for photo and video in a directory results.
trans-unit.target: 目录搜索结果中照片和视频的默认排序方法.

trans-unit.source: Default sorting method for photo and video in a search results.
trans-unit.target: 搜索结果中照片和视频的默认排序方法.

trans-unit.source: Default grouping method for photo and video in a directory results.
trans-unit.target: 目录搜索结果中照片和视频的默认分组方法.

trans-unit.source: Default grouping method for photo and video in a search results.
trans-unit.target: 搜索结果中照片和视频的默认分组方法.

trans-unit.source: Enable zipped download of the listed directory or search results.
trans-unit.target: Enable zipped download of the listed directory or search results.

trans-unit.source: Adds a button to flatten the file structure, by listing the content of all subdirectories. (Won't work if the gallery has multiple folders with the same path.)
trans-unit.target: Adds a button to flatten the file structure, by listing the content of all subdirectories. (Won't work if the gallery has multiple folders with the same path.)

trans-unit.source: Default grid size that is used to render photos and videos.
trans-unit.target: 用于渲染照片和视频的默认网格大小.

trans-unit.source: Shows the number photos and videos on the navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: 在导航栏上显示照片和视频的数量.

trans-unit.source: Visible links in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: 顶部菜单中的可见链接.

trans-unit.source: Ratio of the page height, you need to scroll to show the navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: 页面高度比例,需要滚动才能显示导航栏.

trans-unit.source: Ratio of the page height, you need to scroll to hide the navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: 页面高度比例,需要滚动才能隐藏导航栏.

trans-unit.source: Set when the floating scroll-up button should be visible.
trans-unit.target: 设置浮动向上滚动按钮何时可见.

trans-unit.source: Default time interval for displaying a photo in the slide show.
trans-unit.target: 幻灯片中显示照片的默认时间间隔.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, lightbox will always show caption by default, not only on hover.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用,灯箱将始终默认显示标题,而不仅仅是悬停时.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, lightbox will always show faces by default, not only on hover.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用,灯箱将始终默认显示面孔,而不仅仅是悬停时.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, lightbox will loop videos by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用,灯箱将默认循环播放视频.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, lightbox will start from the first photo when it reached the last one.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, lightbox will start from the first photo when it reached the last one.

trans-unit.source: Load full resolution image on zoom.
trans-unit.target: 放大后加载全分辨率图像.

trans-unit.source: Enables loading the full resolution image on zoom in the ligthbox (preview).
trans-unit.target: 启用在 ligthbox(预览)中缩放时加载全分辨率图像.

trans-unit.source: Load full image if previews are too small
trans-unit.target: Load full image if previews are too small

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the lightbox will load the full resolution image if all available preview thumbnails are too small for the current view.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, the lightbox will load the full resolution image if all available preview thumbnails are too small for the current view.

trans-unit.source: Set these to customize the text (caption, location, etc.) in the lightbox that are always visible over the photo (not in the info panel).
trans-unit.target: Set these to customize the text (caption, location, etc.) in the lightbox that are always visible over the photo (not in the info panel).

trans-unit.source: Adds these css settings as it is to the end of the body tag of the page.
trans-unit.target: 将这些 css 设置按原样添加到页面 body 标签的末尾.

trans-unit.source: Sets the default theme mode that is used for the application.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序使用的默认主题模式.

trans-unit.source: Selected theme to use on the site.
Caches directory contents and search results for better performance.
trans-unit.target: 缓存目录内容和搜索结果以获得更好的性能.
基于滚动的缩略图生成

trans-unit.source: Those thumbnails get higher priority that are visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 那些在屏幕上可见的缩略图获得更高的优先级.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, directories will be sorted by date, like photos, otherwise by name. Directory date is the last modification time of that directory not the creation date of the oldest photo.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用, 目录将和照片一样按日期排序, 否则按名称排序.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, timestamp offsets are ignored, meaning that the local times of pictures are used for searching, sorting and grouping. If disabled, global time is used and pictures with no timestamp are assumed to be in UTC (offset +00:00).
trans-unit.target: If enabled, timestamp offsets are ignored, meaning that the local times of pictures are used for searching, sorting and grouping. If disabled, global time is used and pictures with no timestamp are assumed to be in UTC (offset +00:00).

trans-unit.source: Those thumbnails will be rendered first that are in view.
trans-unit.target: 视图中的缩略图将首先渲染.

trans-unit.source: Show the caption (IPTC 120) tags from the EXIF data instead of the filenames.
trans-unit.target: 显示 EXIF 数据中的标题 (IPTC 120) 标签而不是文件名.

trans-unit.source: Pigallery2 uses Bootstrap 5.3 (https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3) for design (css, layout). In dark mode it sets 'data-bs-theme="dark"' to the <html> to take advantage bootstrap's color modes. For theming, read more at: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/customize/color-modes/
trans-unit.target: Pigallery2 使用 Bootstrap 5.3 (https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3) 设计 (css, 布局). 在黑暗模式下它设置 'data-bs-theme="dark"' 到 <html> 充分利用 Bootstrap 的颜色模式.有关主题的更多信息,请参阅: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.3/customize/color-modes/

trans-unit.source: Makes inline blog (*.md files content) auto-open.
trans-unit.target: Makes inline blog (*.md files content) auto-open.

trans-unit.source: Makes top blog (*.md files content) auto-open.
trans-unit.target: Makes top blog (*.md files content) auto-open.

trans-unit.source: Video formats that are supported after transcoding (with the built-in ffmpeg support).
trans-unit.target: Video formats that are supported after transcoding (with the built-in ffmpeg support).
无需转码即可支持的格式

trans-unit.source: Video formats that are supported also without transcoding. Browser supported formats: https://www.w3schools.com/html/html5_video.asp
trans-unit.target: 无需转码即可支持的视频格式.浏览器支持的格式: https://www.w3schools.com/html/html5_video.asp

trans-unit.source: Size of the thumbnails and photo previews. The best matching size will be used (smaller for photo and video thumbnail, bigger for photo preview). More sizes give better quality, but use more storage and CPU to render. If size is 240, that shorter side of the thumbnail will be 240 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Size of the thumbnails and photo previews. The best matching size will be used (smaller for photo and video thumbnail, bigger for photo preview). More sizes give better quality, but use more storage and CPU to render. If size is 240, that shorter side of the thumbnail will be 240 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Photo formats that are supported. Browser needs to support these formats natively. Also sharp (libvips) package should be able to convert these formats.
trans-unit.target: 支持的照片格式.浏览器需要原生支持这些格式.sharp (libvips) 软件包也应该能够转换这些格式..

trans-unit.source: Enables lossy (based on delta time and distance. Too frequent points are removed) GPX compression.
trans-unit.target: 启用有损（基于增量时间和距离.过于频繁的点将被删除）GPX 压缩.

trans-unit.source: Reads *.gpx files and renders them on the map.
trans-unit.target: 读取 *.gpx 文件并将它们渲染在地图上.

trans-unit.source: Reads *.md files in a directory and shows the next to the map.
trans-unit.target: 读取目录中的 *.md 文件并在地图旁边显示.

trans-unit.source: Reads *.pg2conf files (You can use it for custom sorting and saved search (albums)).
trans-unit.target: 读取 *.pg2conf 文件（您可以使用它进行自定义排序和保存的搜索（相册））.

trans-unit.source: The app will read and process these files.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序将读取并处理这些文件.

trans-unit.source: If a photo has the same face (person) name and keyword, the app removes the duplicate, keeping the face only.
trans-unit.target: 如果照片具有相同的面部(人)名称和关键字, 应用程序将删除重复项, 仅保留面部.

trans-unit.source: Required minimum right to star (favourite) a face.
trans-unit.target: 为(最喜欢的)人脸加注星标所需的最低权限.

trans-unit.source: Required minimum right to show the faces tab.
trans-unit.target: 显示“面孔”选项卡所需的最低权限.

trans-unit.source: If you access the page from local network it's good to know the public url for creating sharing link.
trans-unit.target: If you access the page from local network it's good to know the public url for creating sharing link.

trans-unit.source: If you access the gallery under a sub url (like: http://mydomain.com/myGallery), set it here. If it is not working you might miss the '/' from the beginning of the url.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在子URL下访问画廊(例如: http://mydomain.com/myGallery), 请在此处进行设置. 如果不生效,可能是你漏掉了开头的'/'.

trans-unit.source: Injects the content of this between the <head></head> HTML tags of the app. (You can use it to add analytics or custom code to the app).
trans-unit.target: Injects the content of this between the <head></head> HTML tags of the app. (You can use it to add analytics or custom code to the app).

trans-unit.source: Sets the icon of the app. Rendered icons are cached in the tmp folder.
trans-unit.target: Sets the icon of the app. Rendered icons are cached in the tmp folder.

trans-unit.source: Enables user management with login to password protect the gallery.
trans-unit.target: 启用用户管理,通过登录密码保护图库.

trans-unit.source: Default user right when password protection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 密码保护禁用时的默认用户权限.

trans-unit.source: This feature enables you to generate 'random photo' urls. That URL returns a photo random selected from your gallery. You can use the url with 3rd party application like random changing desktop background. Note: With the current implementation, random link also requires login.
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许您生成“随机照片”网址.该网址会返回从您的图库中随机选择的照片.您可以将该网址与第三方应用程序（例如随机更改桌面背景）一起使用.注意：在当前实现中,随机链接也需要登录.

trans-unit.source: These thumbnails will be generated. The list should be a subset of the enabled thumbnail sizes
trans-unit.target: 将生成这些缩略图. 列表是开启缩略图大小的一部分.

trans-unit.source: Sizes bigger than this value won't be generated for videos. Videos does not use photo based previews, so it is not needed to generate big previews for them.
trans-unit.target: Sizes bigger than this value won't be generated for videos. Videos does not use photo based previews, so it is not needed to generate big previews for them.

trans-unit.source: Only indexes a folder if it got changed.
trans-unit.target: 仅在文件夹更改时索引.

trans-unit.source: Set these search queries to find photos and videos to email.
trans-unit.target: 设置这些搜索查询来查找要通过电子邮件发送的照片和视频.
收件人的电子邮件地址.

trans-unit.source: Messenger to send this message with.
trans-unit.target: Messenger to send this message with.

trans-unit.source: Scans the whole gallery from disk and indexes it to the DB.
trans-unit.target: 从磁盘扫描整个图库并将其索引到数据库.

trans-unit.source: Deletes all directories, photos and videos from the DB.
trans-unit.target: 从数据库中删除所有目录、照片和视频.

trans-unit.source: Removes all albums from the DB
trans-unit.target: 从数据库中删除所有专辑

trans-unit.source: Generates thumbnails and high-res photos from all media files and stores them in the tmp folder. Smaller sizes will be used for thumbnail (in the grid view), bigger sizes for previews (in the lightbox). Videos does not use photo previews (the app loads the video file instead).
trans-unit.target: Generates thumbnails and high-res photos from all media files and stores them in the tmp folder. Smaller sizes will be used for thumbnail (in the grid view), bigger sizes for previews (in the lightbox). Videos does not use photo previews (the app loads the video file instead).

trans-unit.source: Transcodes all videos and stores them in the tmp folder.
trans-unit.target: 对所有视频进行转码并将其存储在 tmp 文件夹中.

trans-unit.source: Removes unnecessary files from the tmp folder.
trans-unit.target: 从 tmp 文件夹中删除不需要的文件.

trans-unit.source: Updates the cover photo of all albums (both directories and saved searches) and faces.
trans-unit.target: 更新所有相册（目录和已保存的搜索）的封面照片和面孔.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the cover photo of all albums and faces
trans-unit.target: 删除所有相册的封面照片和面孔
压缩所有 gpx 文件
删除所有压缩的 GPX 文件

trans-unit.source: Gets the top photos of the selected search queries and sends them over email. You need to set up the SMTP server connection to send e-mails.
trans-unit.target: 获取所选搜索查询的热门照片并通过电子邮件发送.您需要设置 SMTP 服务器连接才能发送电子邮件.

trans-unit.source: To dismiss these notifications, restart the server.
trans-unit.target: 要关闭这些通知, 请重新启动服务器.

trans-unit.note: title of left card in settings page that contains settings contents

trans-unit.source: Album is locked, cannot be deleted from the webpage.
trans-unit.target: 相册已被锁, 无法从页面上删除.

trans-unit.source: Add this json to a '.saved_searches.pg2conf' file in your gallery:
trans-unit.target: 将这个json数据加入到你相册中的 '.saved_searches.pg2conf' 文件:

trans-unit.source: This saved search will be loaded from file during gallery indexing and it will survive a database reset.
trans-unit.target: 保存的搜索将在图库索引期间从文件中加载, 并且不会受数据库重置影响.

trans-unit.source: Too many results to show. Refine your search.
trans-unit.target: 结果太多无法显示. 请改善你的搜索条件.
切换全屏, 快捷键: f

trans-unit.source: Title and description of the media
trans-unit.target: Title and description of the media

trans-unit.source: When this photo or video was taken
trans-unit.target: When this photo or video was taken

trans-unit.source: Click to search for media from the same date
trans-unit.target: Click to search for media from the same date

trans-unit.source: Camera and lens information used to take this photo
trans-unit.target: Camera and lens information used to take this photo

trans-unit.source: Click to search for photos taken with this camera
trans-unit.target: Click to search for photos taken with this camera

trans-unit.source: ISO sensitivity - higher values for darker conditions
trans-unit.target: ISO sensitivity - higher values for darker conditions

trans-unit.source: Aperture - lower numbers mean more background blur
trans-unit.target: Aperture - lower numbers mean more background blur

trans-unit.source: Shutter speed - how long the sensor was exposed to light
trans-unit.target: Shutter speed - how long the sensor was exposed to light

trans-unit.source: Focal length - zoom level of the lens
trans-unit.target: Focal length - zoom level of the lens

trans-unit.source: Keywords and people tags associated with this media
trans-unit.target: Keywords and people tags associated with this media

trans-unit.source: Location information where this media was captured
trans-unit.target: Location information where this media was captured

trans-unit.source: Click location parts to search for media from the same area
trans-unit.target: Click location parts to search for media from the same area

trans-unit.source: Click GPS coordinates to search for nearby media
trans-unit.target: Click GPS coordinates to search for nearby media

trans-unit.source: Most likely the video is not transcoded. It can be done in the settings. You need to transcode these videos to watch them online:
trans-unit.target: 很可能视频没有转码. 可以通过设置进行转码. 这些视频转码之后才能在线观看

trans-unit.source: Url has been copied to clipboard
Click share to get a link.
trans-unit.target: 点击分享即可获取链接.

trans-unit.source: Sharing link has been copied to clipboard
trans-unit.target: 共享链接已复制到剪贴板

trans-unit.source: It seems that you are running the application in a Docker container. This setting should not be changed in docker. Make sure, that you know what you are doing.
trans-unit.target: 您似乎是在 Docker 容器中运行该应用程序. Docker内的这个配置不应该被修改,除非您知道你在做什么.

trans-unit.source: To auto load these values from file: pick an SVG file with a single 'path'. You can use e.g: http://fontawesome.com/icons.
trans-unit.target: 要从文件自动加载这些值：选择一个具有单个“路径”的 SVG 文件.例如,您可以使用这些: http://fontawesome.com/icons.

trans-unit.source: Reset database after changing this settings!
trans-unit.target: 更改此设置后重置数据库!

trans-unit.source: Restart server after changing this settings!
trans-unit.target: 更改此设置后重新启动服务器!

trans-unit.source: config is not supported with these settings.
Controls the permissions of the user.
trans-unit.target: Controls the permissions of the user.

trans-unit.source: Leave empty to keep the current password.
trans-unit.target: Leave empty to keep the current password.

trans-unit.source: Enable to apply the queries below to limit what this user can see.
trans-unit.target: Enable to apply the queries below to limit what this user can see.

trans-unit.source: Only items matching this query will be visible.
trans-unit.target: Only items matching this query will be visible.

trans-unit.source: Items matching this query will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: Items matching this query will be hidden.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to run this job? This will have the following effect:
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to run this job? This will have the following effect:

trans-unit.source: Set the time to run the job.
The job will run after that job finishes.
trans-unit.target: 这个任务会在那个任务完成后运行.

trans-unit.source: Enables the job to start even if another job is already running.
trans-unit.target: 即使其他任务已在运行, 也能使任务启动.

trans-unit.source: Search query to list photos and videos.
trans-unit.target: 搜索查询以列出照片和视频.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the photos and videos by this.
trans-unit.target: 按此对照片和视频进行排序.

trans-unit.source: Number of photos and videos to pick.
trans-unit.target: 可供选择的照片和视频数量.
